TopicTitle: What indicates Apogee and Perigee on Orbiter?

Articles.Content: So I now have the Delta Glider in orbit. I added some thrust and boosted my Apogee. I wanted to complete the Hohmann transfer but I wasn\'t sure how I could tell when I hit my Apogee. Anybody know?

Never mind. I found out!

But I\'m making this post because... check it out!

Using only the main engines, I established a PERFECT orbit. Something I\'ve never been able to do in KSP
